articles.author: Dan Keating
articles.title: How The Post found growing rates of young cancer in America’s Corn Belt - The Washington Post
articles.description: In looking into shifting cancer rates, a Washington Post data analysis revealed a divergence: among young adults in the Corn Belt — Iowa, Nebraska, Illinois, Minnesota, Indiana and Kansas — cancer diagnoses are rising more rapidly than in the country as a who…
